net.oneandone.testlinkjunit.tljunit

Class AbstractTestLinkRunListener<T extends AbstractInTestLinkRunListener>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.junit.runner.notification.RunListener
      • net.oneandone.testlinkjunit.tljunit.AbstractTestLinkRunListener<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - type of the listener to be called when a TestLink annotation exists.
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    TestLinkLoggingRunListener, TestLinkXmlRunListener

    public abstract class AbstractTestLinkRunListener<T extends AbstractInTestLinkRunListener>
extends org.junit.runner.notification.RunListener
    Abstract class which encapsulates the switching between Tests with and without TestLink annotations. Overriding of behaviour must be accomplished by injecting a specific AbstractInTestLinkRunListener as all methods defined here are final. Note that RunListener.testRunStarted(org.junit.runner.Description) and RunListener.testRunFinished(org.junit.runner.Result) are not final as these probably must be extended for flushing and closing a stream etc.
    Author:
    Mirko Friedenhagen
